name: Brand Definition
description:
Brand Definition is a communications agency that brings together the best of traditional media relations, positioning and promotion with innovative digital concepts and rock-solid execution.
We are a team of hard-working professionals. We all know our roles, our markets, our technologies, and we like what we do.
Where other agencies struggle with client-churn, staff turnover, and top-heavy management, Definition is agile and provides consistent, strategic results.
